name: Gotta Date Them All
description:
A dating sim where gameplay is the main focus. Engage in lots of match 3 dates to earn affection with a wide variety of girls. Experience lots of cute date events as you gain more affection with each girl. With item gifts to give to girls during the date, you can alter the board to earn as many points as possible. Be able to earn affection points for upgrades in many different ways such as figuring out what gifts each girl likes most, completing quests, chatting with the characters to bond and of course completing dates with them!

Be able to date up to 6 unique characters.
Unlock many types of gifts to help win dates as well as earn affection with each girl outside of dates as well.
Upgrade different characteristics for your character as you make your way to making each girl fall for you.
Unlock multiple special events with each girl as they get closer to you.

Enjoy a cute romance that's fun to play. Develop bonds and find out more about each girl. Rule the world! ... or at least mean the world to all of these characters.
